name: In Between (Update)
description:
You're a reaper searching for a queen overdue for death. Solve puzzles, beat bosses, solve more puzzles, and find your way to the heart of her city. 10-20 minutes play time.

Created for PengJam 2021, this is the version where a game-breaking bug is fixed. All assets were made by me except the character portraits, which were a commission from misnina (https://toyhou.se/misnina). Currently, it is still pending tests and feedback, but the core game is done.
